entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
